title: Identify the $$z-score$$.
text: The absolute value of the $$z-score$$ is how many standard deviations our $$x$$ value is from the mean. Identify the absolute value of the $$z-score$$.

title: Z-score
text: In the problem, we solved for the $$z-score$$ when $$x=168$$. What is the $$z-score$$?

title: Absolute Value
text: What is the absolute value of the $$z-score$$?
